title: UK renters: share your housing issues
description:
We’d like to hear from renters in the UK who are concerned about issues including insecure housing and poor living conditions

Private rents in the UK have soared to record levels, while a shortage of housing in cities means many renters are scrambling to find somewhere to live.

It has become commonplace for prospective tenants to be advised to offer rent above asking price, while some outbid others by paying six to 12 months’ rent upfront. Some are unable to find secure housing, being forced to live in precarious housing situations, including illegal sublets.
